pr_title: feat: rewrite authentication policy to use default scope

timeline.message: feat: rewrite authentication policy to use default scope

timeline.bodyText: Is it possible to have UPPERCASE of getProtocol?
timeline.author: weidongxu-microsoft

replies.bodyText: I haven't met a UPPERCASE protocol url, but I think we could handle it.
replies.author: ChenTanyi

timeline.bodyText:
Not sure about doOnNext, it could still follow by an Error instead of Complete. Maybe doOnSuccess?
Input of doOnSuccess could be null.
timeline.author: weidongxu-microsoft

replies.bodyText: I'll test about it, since we don't catch exception, if the credential get token with error it will throw it and the pipeline will be terminated.
replies.author: ChenTanyi

replies.bodyText: The point here is that I do not want to write to the cache unless it is a success (+ token not null).
replies.author: weidongxu-microsoft

replies.bodyText: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/55976963/is-there-a-difference-between-doonsuccess-vs-doonnext-for-a-mono As SO said, it seems doOnNext is more likely to be used which would skip when data is null.
replies.author: ChenTanyi
